page.description: HTML content to wrap around the ViewBox Layout.

discussion.p: The *[ui:Wrapper HTML]* property defines the HTML content to wrap around the ViewBox.

description.p: The Wrapper HTML must include a div element with an attribute called *[html:a5-layout-target]* and the value of this attribute must be set to *[html:true]*. This is the div where the ViewBox layout will be injected
This property is shown when [Use wrapper] is enabled.
